**Decision Process:**
1. Nick proposes product direction with business context
2. Brad assesses technical feasibility
3. Mat flags security/compliance concerns
4. Tom provides business context (if strategic)
5. Jeff makes final decision on roadmap impact
6. Decision documented in closing comment
7. Summary posted to #tech-team and #tech-updates
